roleset.name: create spots
roleset.note: DAPPLE-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from dapple.01-v)

example.name: All args
example.text: The sharp sunshine of early summer dappled the surface of the alley with the hard shadows of the branches that stretched overhead
example.arg: The sharp sunshine of early summer
with the hard shadows of the branches that stretched overhead

example.name: Adjectival
example.text: A dappled horse gets its name from its circular, shield-like, patches of brilliant white and dark brown.
